member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.AadIssuerValidator
member.summary: Generic class that validates token issuer from the provided Azure AD authority.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.AadIssuerValidator.Validate(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters)
member.summary: Validate the issuer for multi-tenant applications of various audiences (Work and School accounts, or Work and School accounts + Personal accounts).
member.remarks: The issuer is considered as valid if it has the same HTTP scheme and authority as the authority from the configuration file, has a tenant ID, and optionally v2.0 (this web API accepts both V1 and V2 tokens).
member.returns: The issuer if it's valid, or otherwise SecurityTokenInvalidIssuerException is thrown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.AadIssuerValidator.GetTenantIdFromToken(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken)
member.summary: Gets the tenant ID from a token.
member.returns: A string containing the tenant ID, if found or .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.MicrosoftIdentityIssuerValidatorFactory
member.summary: Factory class for creating the IssuerValidator per authority.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.MicrosoftIdentityIssuerValidatorFactory.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.Resource.MicrosoftIdentityIssuerValidatorFactory.GetAadIssuerValidator(System.String)
member.param: The authority to create the validator for, e.g. https://login.microsoftonline.com/.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.AadIssuerValidatorOptions
member.summary: Options passed-in to create the AadIssuerValidator object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.AadIssuerValidatorOptions.HttpClientName
member.summary: Sets the name of the HttpClient to get from the IHttpClientFactory for use with the configuration manager. Needed when customizing the client such as configuring a proxy.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.InstanceDiscovery.IssuerConfigurationRetriever
member.summary: An implementation of IConfigurationRetriever geared towards Azure AD issuers metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Identity.Web.InstanceDiscovery.IssuerConfigurationRetriever.GetConfigurationAsync(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.IDocumentRetriever,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves a populated configuration given an address and an .
member.param: The to use to read the discovery document.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation. .
member.returns: A that, when completed, returns from the configuration.
member.exception: address - Azure AD Issuer metadata address URL is required or retriever - No metadata document retriever is provided.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Identity.Web.InstanceDiscovery.IssuerMetadata
member.summary: Model class to hold information parsed from the Azure AD issuer endpoint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Identity.Web.InstanceDiscovery.IssuerMetadata.Issuer
member.summary: Issuer associated with the OIDC endpoint.
